enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.help: Default: True. Will disable if an error occurs; otherwise set to disable to disable plugin

version.label: Version
version.help: Version of the plugin in the plugin.json file

hdhr_id.label: hdhr_id
hdhr_id.help: Unique HDHomerun CRC-based hex code for this plugin

player-tuner_count.label: tuner_count
player-tuner_count.help: Default: 10. Number of streams active at one time

player-send_atsc_keepalive.label: Send ATSC Keep-Alive
player-send_atsc_keepalive.help: Default: False. For internalpproxy, when the provider stops sending packets or the stream is being filtered for 15 seconds, will send a ATSC keep-alive msg to client

stream-g_stream_timeout.label: Stream Timeout
stream-g_stream_timeout.help: Default: 110. Used on internalproxy, streamlinkproxy and ffmpegproxy. Time in seconds to shutdown stream when no data comes from provider.  Should be about 4x HTTPRetries*HTTPTimeout

stream-g_concurrent_downloads.label: Concurrent Downloads
stream-g_concurrent_downloads.help: Default: 3. Only used on internalproxy. Number of parallel video packet downloads happening at one time.  A value of one means no parallel processing.  Helps when provider requests are timing out.

stream-g_http_timeout.label: HTTP Timeout
stream-g_http_timeout.help: Default: 8. Only used on internalproxy. Time in seconds for the time to wait for the provider to respond for each HTTP video packet request

stream-g_http_retries.label: HTTP Retries
stream-g_http_retries.help: Default: 3. Only used on internalproxy. Number of times the HTTP video packet request occurs when errors are returned by provider
